page.title: 12BOSLEY RESERVOIR
page.content: Bosley reservoir is popular for its fishing there are many varieties of fish including Pike,Perch,Rudd,Dace, Chub,Tench,and Bream.It is a man made reservoir and in 1985 is having some alterations done to it.It is being extended.The soil has been removed and taken to a local farmers field.A sluice is being concreted in to allow more water into the nearby canals. The reservoir attracts Kingfishers,sea gulls,Swans,Mallards,Herons,Grebes, Coots,and Mor Hens.Hundreds of Canada Geese are regular winter visitors to the area.The Prince Albert fishing club owns the fishing rights cost of membership is per Adult , per Child annually.Around the reservoir and the island you can find many trees like Ash,Oak,Holly,Lime,There are lots of insects bees,ants,slugs,snails,Butter_ flies and there are lots of plants.
